title: Ticket #5447: Use default keypair if available and not otherwise specified
description: Instead of always requiring a --keypair option on the command-line, use the usual named/tagged approach to find one. This will allow the admin to provide the user with a keypair, if desired; or if desired, allow the admin to provide a default keypair so that the admin can log into the annex.
